response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This offer not only ensures a fair exchange but also allows you to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I look forward to hearing your response and hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.", "product_price": 9500}
